name: Recoil (itch) (halvardo13)
description:
You cannot use your legs. Take advantage of the recoil from your shotgun to move and jump.

Controls:

Aim: "A - D" or arrow keys,                                                                                                      

Aim Down: "S" or arrow key.

Reload: "R"

Restart Level: "P"

Shoot: Spacebar

------------------------------------

This game was made for the GMTK 2018 game jam
